title.value: V2 Table Code System: Discharge Disposition

description.value: Code system of concepts which specify the disposition of the patient at time of discharge (i.e., discharged to home, expired, etc.). Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PV1 segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0112 (Discharge Disposition)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
